SOFTWARES #

WAMPSERVER #

WampServer is a software bundle for Windows including:

  • Apache Webserver
  • MySQL and MariaDB Database Servers
  • PHP

Don't worry, we won't be coding PHP here, but we will use WampServer because MySQL and a graphical administrative tool called PHPMyAdmin are included

  1. Go to https://sourceforge.net/projects/wampserver/ to download WampServer

But I'm using Linux or I have a Mac

Wamp is available only for Windows but you can use XAMPP instead. XAMPP (Cross platform, Apache, MariaDB, PHP & Perl)

So basically both Xampp and Wamp can be used but the Xampp's default installation doesn't include MySQL.

  1. Install WAMP or XAMPP

Both of these installations are straight-forward wizards.

If you installed Xampp go straight to 6

WAMP #

  1. Open Wamp

  2. Once Wamp is up and running, you can see a green WampServer icon down in the icon tray

  1. Right-click the icon

open the Wamp Settings and untick 'Allow MariaDB'

XAMPP #

  1. Open Xampp Control Panel

  1. Start both Apache and MySQL
